name: Cowboy's Quest. Wild West Game
description:
You spilled saloon visitor's drink. Now visitor is angry and wants to challenge you to a duel. You have only 3 minutes(hours) to find gun

How to play:

A/D - movement

W - enter the building

S - interact

SPACE - shoot

F1 - fullscreen

This is my first game, so it can be ridiculous :D
